full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BSKANG GSO 'PHRIN LAS MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO'I BSKANG GSO 'PHRIN LAS MYUR SGRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, AU RGYAN SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI 'DIR LUGS CUNG ZAD MING TZAM CAN, RDO RJE 'CHANG GI LHA BTZUN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'O,, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR PA DANG BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS ZHABS PAD BRTAN ZHING RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I MDZAD 'PHRIN BZANG PO RNAMS DBYAR GYI MTSO LTAR 'PHEL GYUR CIG ,)
